meanings.definition: A team of junior varsity players.
meanings.sent1: The jayvees practiced hard to improve their skills.
meanings.sent2: The coach selected the jayvees for the upcoming match.
meanings.sent3: During the game, the jayvees accidentally scored in their own goal.
meanings.sent4: The jayvees were the hidden gems of the team, shining brightly in every game.
meanings.sent5: The jayvees' determination and teamwork made them unstoppable on the field.

meanings.definition: The junior varsity level of a sports team.
meanings.sent1: At the school, the jayvees often played against other schools' junior varsity teams.
meanings.sent2: Being part of the jayvees allowed players to gain experience before moving up to varsity.
meanings.sent3: The jayvees celebrated their victory with a pizza party.
meanings.sent4: The jayvees were like seeds planted in the soil, waiting to grow into varsity players.
meanings.sent5: The jayvees' dedication to the sport was evident in every match they played.
